data.title: Zeenat Aman’s Rape Complaint
data.meta_description: MUMBAI- A Mumbai-based businessman was arrested after a leading actress of yesteryears, Zeenat Aman, lodged a complaint accusing him of rape, cheating and forgery, a top police officer said here on March 23. “The complaint was lodged by the victim on Marc
data.text:
MUMBAI- A Mumbai-based businessman was arrested after a leading actress of yesteryears, Zeenat Aman, lodged a complaint accusing him of rape, cheating and forgery, a top police officer said here on March 23. “The complaint was lodged by the victim on March 22 with Juhu Police Station and the accused has been arrested,” Mumbai Police spokesperson Deepak Deoraj said. Deoraj said the case had been transferred to the Crime Branch for...

Penal Code. Incidentally, on January 30 this year, the actress had lodged a complaint of stalking and harassment against Sarfaraz. The police arrested him after carrying out a detailed investigation, officers said.further investigations. The accused, identified as Sarfaraz Mohammed,38, alias Aman Khanna, was arrested from Versova and has been remanded to police custody till March 28, Deputy Commissioner of Police (Crime Branch) Nisar Tamboli said. This is the second complaint registered by the 69-year old actress against Sarfarz in the past two months. According to the actress’ complaint, between 2011-2015, the accused had taken cash and gold-silver jeweleries worth Rs 15.4 crore from her for business purposes and despite repeated pleas made by her, he refused to return it. Instead, he offered to give her four flats in a government colony and a flat in Santacruz of which he prepared fake documents and cheated her, she said in her complaint.

Simultaneously, he prepared a forged ‘anikaahnama’ (certificate of marriage as per Islamic laws) document in her name on the basis of which he used to threaten and rape her. He has been booked for various offences under Indian
